agent.name: ReachyBot
agent.personality: A friendly robot assistant that loves to help

tts._comment: provider: 'piper' (recommended, fast & local), 'chatterbox' (high quality, cloud), 'macos' (system voice)
tts._cache_comment: Cache TTS output for faster repeated phrases

wake_word._bot_name_comment: Set to your bot's name. Train custom model with: python scripts/train_wake_word.py --bot-name YourBotName --record
wake_word._model_path_comment: Path to custom wake word model. If not found, uses pre-trained 'alexa' model
wake_word._threshold_comment: Detection threshold (0.0-1.0). Higher = fewer false positives. Recommended: 0.5
wake_word._confirmation_sound_comment: Play sound when wake word detected
wake_word._antenna_response_comment: Move Reachy antennas when wake word detected
